items.title: When AI Agents Go Rogue: Agent Session Smuggling Attack in A2A Systems
items.author: Jay Chen and Royce Lu
items.content: Agent session smuggling is a novel technique where AI agent-to-agent communication is misused. We demonstrate two proof of concept examples.
